testcase.name: Validating Microscopy screen under Result Management Menu
testcase.system-out: Given User in Login page....................................................passed When User enters valid username and valid password..........................passed And User selects CP order entry.............................................passed And User doing patient search with some criteria............................passed And User Creating a order for that patient..................................passed And User clicks cancel......................................................passed And User clicks Menu........................................................passed And User clicks Result Management from menu.................................passed And User clicks Microscopy under result management..........................passed And User enters order LRN and retreiving the patient........................passed And User selects one template from the Report Template Dropdown.............passed And User verfifies patient banner details...................................passed And User Verifies the context icon displaying on left side of the screen....passed And User Selects any reporting pathologist from the reporting pathologist field and enter some details on report editor and Click on SAVE AS option.passed And User enters order LRN and retreiving the patient........................passed And User clicks on insert text blocks option................................passed And User click on Synoptic wizard option....................................passed And User click on Diagnosis coding option...................................passed And User click on Release AS option and selects Final report................passed
